experience.title: Software Engineering Intern
content: Built the infrastructure and architecture from scratch.
Scaled the product to 1K+ downloads in just 2 weeks.
Worked on caching, CRONS, notification and messaging features.
Migrated data from Firebase to MongoDB by writing aggregations.

Built a pilot on changing the data models for better analytics.
Wrote unit tests for a feature of the project.
